text:
Agvet Code of Tasmania

The Code, as in force from time to time, set out in the Schedule to the Agricultural and Veterinary Chemicals Code Act 1994 of the Commonwealth is applied (with modifications) as a law of Tasmania by the Agricultural and Veterinary Chemicals (Tasmania) Act 1994 and, as so applying, may be referred to as the Agvet Code of Tasmania

1. Commencement
    The provisions of the Agvet Code of Tasmania were applied (with modifications) as a law of Tasmania on 15 March 1995.

2. Further information
    The full text of the Code is set out in the Schedule to the Agricultural and Veterinary Chemicals Code Act 1994 of the Commonwealth (click on INFORMATION for a link to Commonwealth legislation). See the Agricultural and Veterinary Chemicals (Tasmania) Act 1994 for modifications to the Code as it applies in Tasmania.
